Description.Name: Outworlds Alliance
Description.Details: The [[DM.Factions[faction_Outworld],Outworlds Alliance]] was your home, demonstrating and rioting against a government that betrayed the people.

OptionDescription:
MechWarriors who hail from the Outworlds play nice with Mercenaries who were often employed for garrison duties and the business interests of the Alliance. They often send money back home for food and education.


	Since the beginning of the 31st century, the situation in the [[DM.Factions[faction_Outworld],Outworlds Alliance]] has become particularly grim. With the general loss of technology, Alliance worlds have suffered from declining population and literacy levels. Though protected by a strong military, many of these planets are unable to feed their own people. The people feel that their government has betrayed them, and there have been many riots and demonstrations against the hereditary regimes in recent years.
BioDescription: You grew up in the Outworlds Alliance, demonstrating and rioting against a government that betrayed the people. MechWarriors who hail from the Outworlds play nice with Mercenaries who were often employed for garrison duties and the business interests of the Alliance. They often send money back home for food and education.
